channel.title: Pages on Bio
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Bio

item.title: About
item.description: Sup! Happy you’ve stumbled upon this blog, bear with me and come along for the ride as I introduce to you my very ordinary life and the reason why I’ve decided to open this blog. First things first, my name’s Andrea, Italian boy by birth, I’ve studied Pharmacy in Italy and worked for a bit in Helsinki (y’all need to check out that place, seriously stunning). In Helsinki, I came in contact, for the first time, with the bioinformatics/computational biology field when I was working on data from RNA-seq experiments and thought “this is it, I like this stuff”.
